PARAM.name: show-fbs-policy-name
PARAM.help: Shows policy-map information using name (Max: 63 characters)

PARAM.name: type
PARAM.help: Shows all policy-maps using the policy-map type

PARAM.name: acl-copp
PARAM.help: Show all ACL based CoPP policy-maps

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Shows flow based services policy-map related information
DOCGEN.USAGE: Policy-map type and policy-map name arguments are optional. If type argument or policy-map name not provided command will show all policy-map information. Else it show corresponding policy-map information of given type or given name
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE:
Policy policy_mirror Type monitoring Description: Flow class1 at priority 10 Description: set mirror-session mirror1 Applied to: Vlan100 at Ingress
Policy policy_qos Type qos Description: Flow class_permit_ipv6 at priority 10 Description: police cir 300000000 cbs 300000000 pir 300000000 pbs 300000000 Flow class_permit_ip at priority 10 Description: police cir 300000000 cbs 300000000 pir 300000000 pbs 300000000 Applied to: Vlan100 at Egress
Policy policy_vrf Type forwarding Description: Flow class_permit_ipv6 at priority 10 Description: set ipv6 nexthop 1211::2 priority 20 set ipv6 nexthop 1212::2 vrf Vrf-BLUE priority 30 Flow class_permit_ip at priority 10 Description: set ip nexthop 12.12.1.2 vrf default priority 30 set ip nexthop 12.12.2.2 vrf Vrf-BLUE priority 20 set ip nexthop 12.12.1.2 priority 10 Applied to: Vlan100 at Ingress Switch at Ingress

PARAM.name: match-type
PARAM.help: Shows all class-maps using the match type

PARAM.name: acl
PARAM.help: Shows class-maps which use ACL as match criteria

PARAM.name: fields
PARAM.help: Shows class-maps which use L2-L4 header fields as match criteria

PARAM.name: copp
PARAM.help: Shows class-maps which use CoPP as match criteria

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Shows flow based services class-map related information
DOCGEN.USAGE: Class-map match type and class-map name arguments are optional. If match type argument or class-map name not provided command will show all cclass-map information. Else it show corresponding class-map information of given type or given name
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic# show class-map class_permit_ip Class-map class_permit_ip match-type fields Description: Match: Referenced in flows: policy policy_qos at priority 10 policy policy_vrf at priority 10

COMMAND.name: show service-policy summary
COMMAND.help: Shows summary of all applied polices

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Shows summary of applied flow based services policies
DOCGEN.USAGE: Interface argument is optional. If interface is not specified it shows all service applied interfaces and their policy information. If interface is specified it shows service applied policy information for given interface.If interface is Switch it shows global/Switch level service policies.

EXAMPLE.summary: Displays summary of applied flow based service policies

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic# show service-policy summary Vlan100 monitoring policy policy_mirror at ingress forwarding policy policy_vrf at ingress qos policy policy_qos at egress Switch forwarding policy policy_vrf at ingress CtrlPlane qos policy oob-qos-policy at ingress

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Shows flow based services applied policies information by policy name
DOCGEN.USAGE: policy-map interface argument is optional. If interface is not specified then it shows all services applied interfaces information for given policy. If interface is also specified then it gives service applied information for given policy name and given interface

EXAMPLE.summary: Displays fbs service applied for given policy policy_vrf

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: show service-policy policy-map policy_vrf Vlan100 Policy policy_vrf type forwarding at ingress Description: Flow class_permit_ipv6 at priority 10 (Inactive) Description: set ipv6 nexthop 1211::2 priority 20 set ipv6 nexthop 1212::2 vrf Vrf-BLUE priority 30 Packet matches: 0 frames 0 bytes Flow class_permit_ip at priority 10 (Inactive) Description: set ip nexthop 12.12.1.2 vrf default priority 30 set ip nexthop 12.12.2.2 vrf Vrf-BLUE priority 20 set ip nexthop 12.12.1.2 priority 10 Packet matches: 0 frames 0 bytes Switch Policy policy_vrf type forwarding at ingress Description: Flow class_permit_ipv6 at priority 10 (Inactive) Description: set ipv6 nexthop 1211::2 priority 20 set ipv6 nexthop 1212::2 vrf Vrf-BLUE priority 30 Packet matches: 0 frames 0 bytes Flow class_permit_ip at priority 10 (Inactive) Description: set ip nexthop 12.12.1.2 vrf default priority 30 set ip nexthop 12.12.2.2 vrf Vrf-BLUE priority 20 set ip nexthop 12.12.1.2 priority 10 Packet matches: 0 frames 0 bytes

COMMAND.name: show service-policy interface
COMMAND.help: Shows policy-map binding details by interface name

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Shows flow based services applied policies information by interface name
DOCGEN.USAGE: policy-map type is optional. If type is not specified then all policies applied to this given interface will be shown. If type is also provided then only corresponding type policies applied on the given interface will be shown

EXAMPLE.summary: Display fbs service applied on given interface vlan 100

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: show service-policy interface Vlan 100 Vlan100 Policy policy_mirror type monitoring at ingress Description: Flow class1 at priority 10 (Active) Description: Packet matches: 0 frames 0 bytes Policy policy_vrf type forwarding at ingress Description: Flow class_permit_ipv6 at priority 10 (Inactive) Description: set ipv6 nexthop 1211::2 priority 20 set ipv6 nexthop 1212::2 vrf Vrf-BLUE priority 30 Packet matches: 0 frames 0 bytes Flow class_permit_ip at priority 10 (Active) Description: set ip nexthop 12.12.1.2 vrf default priority 30 set ip nexthop 12.12.2.2 vrf Vrf-BLUE priority 20 set ip nexthop 12.12.1.2 priority 10 Packet matches: 0 frames 0 bytes Policy policy_qos type qos at egress Description: Flow class_permit_ipv6 at priority 10 (Inactive) Description: police: cir 300000000 cbs 300000000 pir 300000000 pbs 300000000 (Active) type bytes mode color-blind operational cir 0 cbs 0 pir 0 pbs 0 green 0 packets 0 bytes action forward yellow 0 packets 0 bytes action forward red 0 packets 0 bytes action drop Packet matches: 0 frames 0 bytes Flow class_permit_ip at priority 10 (Inactive) Description: police: cir 300000000 cbs 300000000 pir 300000000 pbs 300000000 (Active) type bytes mode color-blind operational cir 0 cbs 0 pir 0 pbs 0 green 0 packets 0 bytes action forward yellow 0 packets 0 bytes action forward red 0 packets 0 bytes action drop Packet matches: 0 frames 0 bytes

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Shows Global/Switch level flow based services applied policies information

EXAMPLE.summary: Displays service policies applied at the Switch level

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: Sonic# show service-policy Switch Switch Policy policy_vrf type forwarding at ingress Description: Flow class_permit_ipv6 at priority 10 (Inactive) Description: set ipv6 nexthop 1211::2 priority 20 set ipv6 nexthop 1212::2 vrf Vrf-BLUE priority 30 Packet matches: 0 frames 0 bytes Flow class_permit_ip at priority 10 (Inactive) Description: set ip nexthop 12.12.1.2 vrf default priority 30 set ip nexthop 12.12.2.2 vrf Vrf-BLUE priority 20 set ip nexthop 12.12.1.2 priority 10 Packet matches: 0 frames 0 bytes

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Shows running configuration of class-map(s)
DOCGEN.USAGE: Class-map name is optional. If Class-map name provided it will show all running configuration of all class-maps configured
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic# show running-configuration class-map class_permit_ipv6 class-map class_permit_ipv6 match-type fields match-all

PARAM.name: show-fbs-policy-name
PARAM.help: Shows policy-map information using name (Max: 63 characters)

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Shows running configuration of policy-map(s)
DOCGEN.USAGE: Policy-map name is optional. If policy-map name provided it will show all running configuration of all policy-maps configured
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic# show running-configuration policy-map policy_vrf policy-map policy_vrf type forwarding class class_permit_ipv6 priority 10 set ipv6 next-hop 1211::2 priority 20 set ipv6 next-hop 1212::2 vrf Vrf-BLUE priority 30 class class_permit_ip priority 10 set ip next-hop 12.12.1.2 vrf default priority 30 set ip next-hop 12.12.2.2 vrf Vrf-BLUE priority 20 set ip next-hop 12.12.1.2 priority 10

COMMAND.name: clear counters service-policy policy-map
COMMAND.help: Clear policy-map binding counters using policy-map name

PARAM.name: interface-type-options
PARAM.help: Clear counters for policy-maps applied to interface

PARAM.name: interface
PARAM.help: Clear counters for policy-maps applied to interface

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Clears flow based services applied policies counters by policy name
DOCGEN.USAGE: Interface argument is optional. If not specified it clear fbs policies counters for given policy-map for all interfaces
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: clear counters service-policy policy-map policy_vrf interface Vlan 100

COMMAND.name: clear counters service-policy interface
COMMAND.help: Clear counters for policy-maps applied to interface

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Clears flow based services applied policies counters by interface
DOCGEN.USAGE: Policy-map type argument is optional. If policy-map type not specified it clear fbs policies counters for given interfaces for all policies matching that interface.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: clear counters service-policy interface Vlan 100 type qos

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Clears flow based services applied policy-map applied at Switch/Global level
DOCGEN.USAGE: Policy-map type argument is optional. If policy-map type not specified it clear fbs policies counters for given interfaces for all policies matching that interface.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic# clear counters service-policy Switch type qos

COMMAND.name: show pbf
COMMAND.help: Shows policy based forwarding next-hop groups

PARAM.name: show-fbs-group-name
PARAM.help: Shows next-hop group information using name (Max: 63 characters)

PARAM.name: type
PARAM.help: Shows all next-hop groups using the group type

PARAM.name: show-fbs-group-name
PARAM.help: Shows next-hop group information using name (Max: 63 characters)

PARAM.name: type
PARAM.help: Shows all next-hop groups using the group type

PARAM.name: show-fbs-group-name
PARAM.help: Shows next-hop group information using name (Max: 63 characters)

PARAM.name: type
PARAM.help: Shows all next-hop groups using the group type

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures policy-map
DOCGEN.USAGE: Policy-map name can be of maximum 63 characters. The name must begin with A-Z, a-z or 0-9. Underscore and hypens can be used except as the first character
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# policy-map policy_vrf type forwarding

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Deletes policy-map
DOCGEN.USAGE: Policy-map name can be of maximum 63 characters. The name must begin with A-Z, a-z or 0-9. Underscore and hypens can be used except as the first character
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# no policy-map policy_vrf

PARAM.name: acl
PARAM.help: Class-map using ACL as match criteria

PARAM.name: fields
PARAM.help: Class-map using L2-L4 header fields as match criteria

PARAM.name: copp
PARAM.help: Class-map using CoPP as match criteria

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures Class-map
DOCGEN.USAGE: Class-map name can be of maximum 63 characters. The name must begin with A-Z, a-z or 0-9. Underscore and hypens can be used except as the first character.

EXAMPLE.summary: Creates class-map with match type fields

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# class-map class_permit_ip match-type fields

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Deletes Class-map
DOCGEN.USAGE: Class-map name can be of maximum 63 characters. The name must begin with A-Z, a-z or 0-9. Underscore and hypens can be used except as the first character.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# no class-map class_permit_ip

PARAM.name: fbs-nhgrp-name
PARAM.help: Name of the Next-hop group (Max: 63 characters)

PARAM.name: ip
PARAM.help: Next hop group with IPv4 next-hop members

PARAM.name: ipv6
PARAM.help: Next hop group with IPv6 next-hop members

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Creates a policy based forwarding next-hop group
DOCGEN.USAGE: A next-hop-group name can be of maximum 63 characters. The name must begin with A-Z, a-z or 0-9. Underscore and hypens can be used except as the first character. A next-hop-group can be of type ip or ipv6. The group type can not be updated after its created. The group type is mandatory at the time of creating the group.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# pbf next-hop-group ipv4-group-1 type ip sonic-cli(config-pbf-ip-nh-group)#

PARAM.name: fbs-nhgrp-name
PARAM.help: Name of the Next-hop group (Max: 63 characters)

COMMAND.name: no
COMMAND.help: Negate a command or set its defaults

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures policy-map description
DOCGEN.USAGE: A string describing the policy-map max 256 characters. Description should be in double quotes if it has spaces
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config-policy-map)# description "Vrf policy information"

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Removes class-map description
DOCGEN.USAGE: A string describing the policy-map max 256 characters. Description should be in double quotes if it has spaces
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config-policy-map)# no description

COMMAND.name: class
COMMAND.help: Configures flow match criteria and its actions

COMMAND.name: no class
COMMAND.help: Delete flow match criteria and its actions

COMMAND.name: no
COMMAND.help: Negate a command or set its defaults

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures class-map match ACL
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# class-map class_ip_acl match-type acl sonic(config-class-map)# match access-group ip ip_acl1

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Removes class-map match ACL
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# class-map class_ip_acl match-type acl sonic(config-class-map)# no match access-group

COMMAND.name: no
COMMAND.help: Negate a command or set its defaults

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures class-map match packet source-address
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# class-map class1_fields match-type fields match-all sonic(config-class-map)# match source-address ip 1.1.1.1/32

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Removes class-map match packet source-address
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# class-map class1_fields match-type fields match-all sonic(config-class-map)# no match source-address

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures class-map match packet destination-address
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# class-map class1_fields match-type fields match-all sonic(config-class-map)# match destination-address ip 2.1.1.1/32

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Removes class-map match packet destination-address
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# class-map class1_fields match-type fields match-all sonic(config-class-map)# no match destination-address

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures class-map match packet criteria ethertype
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# class-map class1_fields match-type fields match-all sonic(config-class-map)# match ethertype ip

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Removes class-map match packet criteria ethertype
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# class-map class1_fields match-type fields match-all sonic(config-class-map)# no match ethertype

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures class-map match packet criteria vlan ID

EXAMPLE.summary: Configures class-map match packet vlan id

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# class-map class1_fields match-type fields match-all sonic(config-class-map)# match vlan 200

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Removes class-map match packet criteria vlan ID

EXAMPLE.summary: Removes class-map match packet vlan ID

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# class-map class1_fields match-type fields match-all sonic(config-class-map)# no match vlan

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures class-map match packet criteria pcp
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# class-map class1_fields match-type fields match-all sonic(config-class-map)# match pcp vi

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Removes class-map match packet criteria pcp
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# class-map class1_fields match-type fields match-all sonic(config-class-map)# no match pcp

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures class-map match packet criteria DEI
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# class-map class1_fields match-type fields match-all sonic(config-class-map)# match dei 0

COMMAND.name: no match dei
COMMAND.help: Delete match packets using DEI value

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Removes class-map match packet criteria DEI
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# class-map class1_fields match-type fields match-all sonic(config-class-map)# no match dei

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Updates class-map match ip attributes
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# class-map class1_fields match-type fields match-all sonic(config-class-map)# match ip protocol tcp

COMMAND.name: no match ip
COMMAND.help: Delete match packets using IP/IPv6 protocol

COMMAND.name: no match ip protocol
COMMAND.help: Delete match packets using IP/IPv6 protocol

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Removes class-map match ip attributes
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# class-map class1_fields match-type fields match-all sonic(config-class-map)# no match ip protocol

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures class-map match dscp
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# class-map class1_fields match-type fields match-all sonic(config-class-map)# match dscp cs1

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Removes class-map match dscp
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# class-map class1_fields match-type fields match-all sonic(config-class-map)# no match dscp

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures class-map match l4 source port
DOCGEN.USAGE: Match on source port is allowed only when IP protocol is set to TCP or UDP

EXAMPLE.summary: Configures class-map match l4 source port

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# class-map class1_fields match-type fields match-all sonic(config-class-map)# match l4-port source eq 10

COMMAND.name: no match l4-port
COMMAND.help: Delete match packets using TCP/UDP port

PARAM.name: source
PARAM.help: Delete match on source TCP/UDP Port

PARAM.name: destination
PARAM.help: Delete match on destination TCP/UDP Port

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Removes class-map match l4 source port

EXAMPLE.summary: Removes class-map match l4 source port

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# class-map class1_fields match-type fields match-all sonic(config-class-map)# no match l4-port source

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures class-map match TCP Flags
DOCGEN.USAGE: Match on TCP flags is allowed only when IP protocol is set to TCP. not-xxx keyword can be used to match the corresponding flag set to 0
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# class-map class1_fields match-type fields match-all sonic(config-class-map)# match tcp-flags urg

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Removes class-map match TCP Flags
DOCGEN.USAGE: Match on TCP flags is allowed only when IP protocol is set to TCP. not-xxx keyword can be used to match the corresponding flag set to 0
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# class-map class1_fields match-type fields match-all sonic(config-class-map)# no match tcp-flags urg

COMMAND.name: no
COMMAND.help: Negates a command or set its defaults

COMMAND.name: no match protocol
COMMAND.help: Deletes a match of protocol trap to class-map

COMMAND.name: no
COMMAND.help: Negate a command or set its defaults

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures PCP Remarking action for Qos Flow

EXAMPLE.summary: Configures PCP remarking action for Qos flow

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# policy-map policy_qos type qos sonic(config-policy-map)# class class_permit_ip priority 10 sonic(config-policy-map-flow)# set pcp 1

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Removes PCP Remarking action for Qos Flow

EXAMPLE.summary: Removes PCP remarking action for Qos flow

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# policy-map policy_qos type qos sonic(config-policy-map)# class class_permit_ip priority 10 sonic(config-policy-map-flow)# no set pcp

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures DSCP Remarking action for Qos Flow

EXAMPLE.summary: Configures DSCP remarking action for Qos flow

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# policy-map policy_qos type qos sonic(config-policy-map)# class class_permit_ip priority 10 sonic(config-policy-map-flow)# set dscp 10

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures DSCP Remarking action for Qos Flow

EXAMPLE.summary: Removes DSCP remarking action for Qos flow

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# policy-map policy_qos type qos sonic(config-policy-map)# class class_permit_ip priority 10 sonic(config-policy-map-flow)# no set dscp

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures set traffic class action for Qos Flow

EXAMPLE.summary: Configures traffic class action for Qos Flow

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# policy-map policy_qos type qos sonic(config-policy-map)# class class_permit_ip priority 10 sonic(config-policy-map-flow)#set traffic-class 1

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Removes set traffic class action for Qos Flow

EXAMPLE.summary: Removes traffic class action for Qos Flow

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# policy-map policy_qos type qos sonic(config-policy-map)# class class_permit_ip priority 10 sonic(config-policy-map-flow)# no set traffic-class

COMMAND.name: no
COMMAND.help: Negate a command or set its defaults

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures mirror session name for monitoring flow

EXAMPLE.summary: Configures mirror session name for monitoring Flow

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# policy-map policy_mirror type monitoring sonic(config-policy-map)# class class1 priority 10 sonic(config-policy-map-flow)# set mirror-session mirror1

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigures mirror session name for monitoring flow

EXAMPLE.summary: Unconfiguresd mirror session name for monitoring Flow

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# policy-map policy_mirror type monitoring sonic(config-policy-map)# class class1 priority 10 sonic(config-policy-map-flow)# no set mirror-session

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures ip next hop for forwarding flow
DOCGEN.USAGE: If the VRF name is not specified then it will be derived from the VRF of the interface on which the policy is applied or default will be used for global application. Priority of the next-hop. Range is 1-65535. Default is 0 ie lowest priority if not configured by the user. The next-hop with the higher priority will be picked up for forwarding first. If more than 1 next-hops have the same priority then the next-hop which is configured first will be used.

EXAMPLE.summary: Configures ip next hop for forwarding Flow

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# policy-map policy_vrf type forwarding sonic(config-policy-map)# class class_permit_ip priority 10 set ip next-hop 12.12.2.2 vrf Vrf-BLUE priority 20

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures ipv6 next hop for forwarding flow
DOCGEN.USAGE: If the VRF name is not specified then it will be derived from the VRF of the interface on which the policy is applied or default will be used for global application. Priority of the next-hop. Range is 1-65535. Default is 0 ie lowest priority if not configured by the user. The next-hop with the higher priority will be picked up for forwarding first. If more than 1 next-hops have the same priority then the next-hop which is configured first will be used.

EXAMPLE.summary: Configures ipv6 next hop for forwarding Flow

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# policy-map policy_vrf type forwarding sonic(config-policy-map)# class class_permit_ipv6 priority 10 sonic(config-policy-map)# set ipv6 next-hop 1211::2 priority 20

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures ip interface for forwarding flow
DOCGEN.USAGE: Egress interfaces configuration is valid only if the classifier uses MAC/L2 ACL for match. Only L2 switched traffic will be forwarded to the configured egress interface. Combining egress interface with IPv4 or IPv6 next-hops is not permitted. Drop action(set interface to null) if configured will be of the lowest priority and will be chosen if none of the configured next-hops or egress interfaces can be used for forwarding.

EXAMPLE.summary: Configures ip next hop for forwarding Flow

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# policy-map policy_vrf type forwarding sonic(config-policy-map)# class class10 priority 10 sonic(config-policy-map-flow)# set interface Eth 1/9 sonic(config-policy-map-flow)# set interface null

COMMAND.name: no
COMMAND.help: Negate a command or set its defaults

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigures ip next hop for forwarding flow
DOCGEN.USAGE: If the VRF name is not specified then it will be derived from the VRF of the interface on which the policy is applied or default will be used for global application. Priority of the next-hop. Range is 1-65535. Default is 0 ie lowest priority if not configured by the user. The next-hop with the higher priority will be picked up for forwarding first. If more than 1 next-hops have the same priority then the next-hop which is configured first will be used

EXAMPLE.summary: Unconfigures ip next hop for forwarding Flow

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# policy-map policy_vrf type forwarding sonic(config-policy-map)# class class_permit_ip priority 10 sonic(config-policy-map-flow)#no set ip next-hop 12.12.2.2 vrf Vrf-BLUE priority 20

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigures ipv6 next hop for forwarding flow
DOCGEN.USAGE: If the VRF name is not specified then it will be derived from the VRF of the interface on which the policy is applied or default will be used for global application. Priority of the next-hop. Range is 1-65535. Default is 0 ie lowest priority if not configured by the user. The next-hop with the higher priority will be picked up for forwarding first. If more than 1 next-hops have the same priority then the next-hop which is configured first will be used

EXAMPLE.summary: Unconfigures ipv6 next hop for forwarding Flow

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# policy-map policy_vrf type forwarding sonic(config-policy-map)# class class_permit_ipv6 priority 10 sonic(config-policy-map)# no set ipv6 next-hop 1211::2 priority 20

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigures ip interface for forwarding flow
DOCGEN.USAGE: Egress interfaces configuration is valid only if the classifier uses MAC/L2 ACL for match. Only L2 switched traffic will be forwarded to the configured egress interface. Combining egress interface with IPv4 or IPv6 next-hops is not permitted. Drop action(set interface to null) if configured will be of the lowest priority and will be chosen if none of the configured next-hops or egress interfaces can be used for forwarding

EXAMPLE.summary: Unconfigures ip next hop for forwarding Flow

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# policy-map policy_vrf type forwarding sonic(config-policy-map)# class class10 priority 10 sonic(config-policy-map-flow)# no set interface Eth 1/9

COMMAND.name: set copp-action
COMMAND.help: Binds a CoPP action group to the class-map

PARAM.name: copp-action-name
PARAM.help: Name of the CoPP action group (up to 63 characters)

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Updates class-map match ACL attributes
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# class-map class_ip_acl match-type acl sonic(config-class-map)# match access-group ip ip_acl1

COMMAND.name: no
COMMAND.help: Negate a command or set its defaults

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures CPU Queue for ACL-CoPP flows

EXAMPLE.summary: Configures CPU Queue for acl-copp flows

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# policy-map policy3 type acl-copp sonic(config-policy-map)# class class0 priority 100 sonic(config-policy-map-flow)# set trap-queue 30

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Removes set CPU Queue for ACL-CoPP flows

EXAMPLE.summary: Removes CPU Queue for acl-copp flows

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# policy-map policy3 type acl-copp sonic(config-policy-map)# class class0 priority 100 sonic(config-policy-map-flow)# no set trap-queue

COMMAND.name: no
COMMAND.help: Negate a command or set its defaults

COMMAND.name: no
COMMAND.help: Negate a command or set its defaults
